name: rudie dress
description:
designer:  dear creatures
images:  dear creatures

This is the perfect dress for this holiday season. The black and grey stripes are the perfect color combination for any event. The detailed bow right on the chest gives it that simple yet distinctive touch of elegance without having the fear of being overdressed. The perfect dress to get down and boogie all night!

60% Polyester, 35% Cotton, 5% Spandex
Lining: 95% Polyester, 5% Spandex

Length:
XS: 35 1/2", S: 36 1/4", M: 37", L: 37 1/4"

name: zig zag cardigan
description:
designer:  dear creatures
images:  dear creatures

This angora blend cardigan offers comfort and style all in one! The black and white zig zags give a stylish twist to this classic color pairing while the decorative bows add the final perfect touch to make this cardigan a holiday hit. Pair it with an A-line skirt, tights and mary jane shoes to create the perfect look.

FABRIC CONTENT:
55% Polyester, 20% Acrylic, 20% Nylon, 5% Angora

Length:

name: barbarella dress
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever

The Barbarella Holiday Dress by Fever. This eye-catching party dress is made in metallic jacquard fabric.

It features a 1950s prom shape that is simple yet stylish and perfect for seasonal parties. Part of our Christmas collection, inspired by starlet glamour and vintage elegance.

    Holiday dress
    Boat neckline
    Metallic Jacquard fabric

    Length: 89.50cm/35.24''
    Fabric Composition: 52% Nylon, 22% Polyester. Lining: 100% Cotton

name: lalique dress
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever

The Lalique Dress in Black/Gold by Fever. This thick jersey dress is a seasonal must-have.

It features applique detail to compliment the art deco look, perfect for all festive occasions. Part of our Christmas collection, inspired by starlet glamour and vintage elegance.

    Loose fitting
    Jersey dress
    Long flared sleeves

    Features applique detail
    Length: 92cm/36.22'
    Fabric composition: 60% Polyester 35% Rayon, 5% Elastane - Lining    35% rayon, 65% Polyester.

name: farrinbdon dress
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever

The Farringdon Dress by Fever. This dress is a beautiful combination of sharp tailoring and full bias cut skirt. It features a sharp collar, double breasted buttons and waist tie inspired by the 1950s Fleet Street Mac

This dress is perfect for work and smart occasions. Part of our Heritage Collection, a selection of reworked ladylike classics inspired by rural romance.

    Full skirted shirt dress
    Wide collar
    Double breasted button detail
    Cap sleeves
    Waist tie

    Falls above the knee

    Stretch cotton
    Length: 93cm/36.6"
    Fabric Composition: 97% Cotton, 3% Elastane. Lining: 100% Cotton. Care instructions: Wash at 30 degrees.

name: cuba flare dress black/port/mocha
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever

FINAL SALE - NO EXCHANGES/RETURNS

Make a splash in this sophisticated flute shape dress.

Featuring bright geometric panels which create a stylish 1960s look which is perfect for workwear. Part of the City Collection of metropolitan work wear that mirrors the elegance and glamour of Paris, London and New York style.

    Shift dress
    Fluted shape
    Geometric panel detail

    Knee length
    Concealed zip at the back

    Stretch fabric
    Length: 38.1"
    Fabric Composition: 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane. 

Care instructions: Wash at 30 degrees or professional dry clean.

name: chelsea dress - scarlet/black
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever

FINAL SALE - NO EXCHANGES/RETURNS

The Chelsea Dress is made with a textured stretch fabric and has a structured fit.

The diagonal panel details and the full length sleeves give a sophisticated finish, perfect for work wear or any smart occasion. Part of Fever's City Collection of metropolitan work wear that mirrors the elegance and glamour of Paris, London and New York style.

    Fitted shift dress
    Panel details
    Long sleeves

    Falls above the knee
    Concealed zip at the back

    Textured fabric
    Length: 38.1"
    Fabric Composition: 100% Polyester.

name: winter blossom cowl neck dress
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever

A feminine dress with a dainty foral print and elegant cowl neck. The fitted pencil shape creates a 1940s silhouette.

A versatile shape that can take you from day to night. The fabric has a slight stretch for a flattering fit.  Part of the Heritage Collection, inspired by rural romance.

    Fitted pencil dress
    Dainty floral print
    Cowl neckline

    Knee length
    Keyhole button and concealed zip at the back

    Stretch fabric
    Length: 40"
    Fabric Composition: 97% Polyester, 3% Elastane

name: azur flare dress
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever



An elegant dress with a fitted bodice and full-flare skirt. It features contrasting panels at the waist in shimmering fabric to define your waist. A notch cut out at the neckline is a delicate final touch to this stunning dress.

The perfect dress to make a stylish statement at work or smart occasions. Part of the City Collection of metropolitan work wear that mirrors the elegance and glamour of Paris, London and New York style.

    Fit and flare dress
    Notched neck detail
    Contrast fabric wasit panels

    Knee length
    Concealed zip at the back

    Stretch fabric
    Length: 38.5"
    Fabric Composition: 68% Cotton, 29% Nylon, 3% Elastane.

name: dakota pencil dress
description:
designer:  fever
images:  fever

A tweed pencil dress with gold thread running through, featuring suedette piping trim on the waistband and shoulders.

This dress is a chic choice for the office or smart daytime occasion. Dress it up with a  Jacket for a 1960s look. Part of the heritage collection, inspired by rural romance.

    Fitted pencil dress
    Cap sleeves
    Suedette piping detail
    Zip fastening at the back

    Tweed fabric with metallic thread
    Length: 39.3"
    
Fabric Composition: 74% Polyester, 11% Acrylic, 5% Viscose, 5% Wool, 2% Cotton, 2% Nylon, 1% Metallised Fibre. Lining: 100% Polyester. 

Care Instructions: Dry clean only.

Featuring 1950s details such as a v neck line, pleated shoulder detail and prom shape. A wonderfully feminine style that can take you from day to night. Part of the heritage collection, inspired by rural romance.

    Textured stripe fabric

name: pintuck silk blouse - nasturtium
description:
designer:  modaspia
images:  modaspia

the pintuck blouse in a beautiful nasturtium floral print silk with ties at neck for a modern look.  the watercolor nasturtium flower print is what really pulled me into this fabric.  delicate print on dark taupe background.  silk with a little stretch.  neat row of pintucks front. slightly a-line body with heavy hem. full sleeve finishes at elbow with elastic. key hole closure in back with long ties down the back. pair with jeans and a little silver bracelet. made in oakland, ca. 

silk charmeuse

hand wash and hang to dry.

please see size chart below for best fit.  feel free to contact me with any questions about sizing.  

    XS: bust 32/33", waist 25/26", hips 34/35"

    sm: bust 34/35", waist 27/28", hips 36/37"

    md: bust 36/37", waist 29/30", hips 38/39"

    LG: bust 38/39", waist 31/32", hips 40/41"

name: half moon tunic - stone heathered tweed
description:
designer:  modaspia
images:  modaspia

FINAL SALE/NO EXCHANGES or RETURNS

bohemian tunic in a stone heathered wool from italy. deep scoop neck with half moon detail. 3/4 length narrow sleeve. patch pockets. curved hemline is slightly longer in back. french seams throughout. made in oakland, ca. 

wool

hand wash cool water, hang to dry. dry clean ok too.

XS: bust 32/33", waist 25/26", hips 34/35"

sm: bust 34/35", waist 27/28", hips 36/37"

md: bust 36/37", waist 29/30", hips 38/39"

LG: bust 38/39", waist 31/32", hips 40/41"

name: bauhaus dress - tattoo print
description:
designer:  modaspia
images:  modaspia

light and airy dress with a gentle bell sleeve.  a-line, easy tailored style with darts at the waist, neckline and bust. fit is relaxed and sits a little away from the body.  neckline is slightly wide.  hem finishes below the knee.  the saturated colors throughout are what drew me to this fabric straight away.  beautiful silk crepe de chine, fluid and light. shell background with exotic tattoo print across it. invisible zipper at side. comes with a contrast silk print belt.  made in oakland, ca. 

(washed) silk crepe de chine

hand wash cool with a gentle soap and hang to dry.

please see size chart below for best fit.  feel free to contact me with any questions about sizing.  

    XS: bust 32/33", waist 25/26", hips 34/35"

    sm: bust 34/35", waist 27/28", hips 36/37"

    md: bust 36/37", waist 29/30", hips 38/39"

    LG: bust 38/39", waist 31/32", hips 40/41"

images:  modaspia

the now classic fiji dress in a charcoal woven wool from italy. fabric has a nice weight to it. deep v-neck. shirring at waist and back for a comfortable and flattering fit. front welt pockets. hem finishes just above knee. made in oakland, ca. please allow 1 week delivery.

wool (italy)

wash warm, hang to dry

please see size chart below for best fit. feel free to contact me with any questions about sizing.

silk blouse in a really special print from france.  very delicate ikat pattern in a beautiful teal/grey.  full sleeves with narrow elastic. detail darts at neckline and keyhole closure in back with long ties.  fitted through the shoulders. loose and slightly a-line through body.  heavy hem finishes at hip.  made in oakland, ca.  

silk charmeuse

dry clean best. you can also *hand wash cool with a gentle soap and hang to dry.  garment will shrink in length about 1/2" if hand laundered.

name: classic kurta - booti violet
description:
designer:  rikshaw design
images:  rikshaw design

FINAL SALE/No Returns or Exchanges

Our classic kurta is a wardrobe must-have. The kurta can be worn over a swimsuit and looks great with jeans or shorts too. It has a classic tunic fit with whipstitch detail at the hem,  length sleeves and side slits. Hand block printed on 100% cotton voile. Machine wash cold and line dry recommended. Made in India.
